name: Patrick J. MACPHERSON, Executor of the Estate of Richard Macpherson, Deceased, Petitioner v. The MAGEE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL FOR CONVALESCENCE d/b/a Magee Rehabilitation Hospital, Jefferson Health System, Inc., TJUH System, Manor Care of Yeadon PA, LLC, d/b/a Manorcare Health Services-Yeadon, HCR Manor Care, Inc., Manorcare, Inc., HCR Healthcare, LLC, HCR II Healthcare, LLC, HCR III Healthcare, LLC, Respondents
name_abbreviation: MacPherson v. Magee Memorial Hospital for Convalescence

judges: Justice Donohue, Justice Wecht and Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Patrick J. MACPHERSON, Executor of the Estate of Richard Macpherson, Deceased, Petitioner v. The MAGEE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL FOR CONVALESCENCE d/b/a Magee Rehabilitation Hospital, Jefferson Health System, Inc., TJUH System, Manor Care of Yeadon PA, LLC, d/b/a Manorcare Health Services-Yeadon, HCR Manor Care, Inc., Manorcare, Inc., HCR Healthcare, LLC, HCR II Healthcare, LLC, HCR III Healthcare, LLC, Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Donohue, Justice Wecht and Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
